function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised public health","Mitigation":"Proper evaluation of building ventilation, use of natural ventilation, and implementation of effective ventilation systems","Technologies":"Natural ventilation systems, air purifiers, HVAC systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and public health","Owner":"Architects, engineers, building owners, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of proper cleaning strategies and technologies leading to increased pathogen transmission","Impact":"Higher risk of virus transmission and compromised public health","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced cleaning technologies, touchless technology, and automation, regular cleaning protocols, and utilization of new cleaning strategies","Technologies":"Robotic cleaning systems, touchless technology, advanced cleaning agents","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and public health","Owner":"Architects, engineers, building owners, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate design for pandemic response leading to lack of emergency facilities and infrastructure","Impact":"Limited capacity to respond to pandemics and natural disasters, increased strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Adoption of modular construction, adaptive strategies, and flexible modular design for emergency facilities","Technologies":"Modular construction, adaptable structures, lightweight construction materials","People":"Healthcare providers, emergency responders, and public health","Owner":"Government agencies, architects, and designers"}]}
